about_the_game:
Take your mark... Go! Create up to 5 characters, upgrade your swimmer, recruit swimmers to improve your team and climb to the top division. Build your team from scratch and compete for the championship! Start your dynasty now!

Key Features

Character Customization

Create and customize up to 5 characters, one for each type of stroke: Backstroke, Breaststroke, Butterfly, Freestyle, and All Around. Upgrade them to their max potential to dominate the competition.

Recruit Swimmers

Use recruitment points to message swimmers and convince them to join your team. The higher division you are in the easier it will be to recruit higher caliber swimmers.

Manage Roster

Choose which events you want each swimmer to compete in to have the best chance of winning each meet. Choose which swimmers to cut when new recruits are added.

Create and customize up to 5 characters, one for each type of stroke: Backstroke, Breaststroke, Butterfly, Freestyle, and All Around. Upgrade them to their max potential to dominate the competition.

Recruit Swimmers

Use recruitment points to message swimmers and convince them to join your team. The higher division you are in the easier it will be to recruit higher caliber swimmers.

Manage Roster

Choose which events you want each swimmer to compete in to have the best chance of winning each meet. Choose which swimmers to cut when new recruits are added.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina
  • Processor: 2.9Ghz Dual-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 1536MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Swimming Dynasty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
